name: Stick & Move
description:
Please vote now on Steam Greenlight!

Stick & Move is an arcade game about spinning and navigating your way through maze-like obstacles. Collect dots to build up your power meter and unleash an explosion to carve your way through walls. Do flips to build your point multiplier but don't touch the walls, saws, or explosive blocks! Current version features one game mode, five color schemes, and a pounding synthwave soundtrack. Future updates will add:

  • More difficulty levels
  • More obstacles and power-ups
  • Challenge mode
  • Stat tracking and objectives
  • Trick system
  • More color schemes, backgrounds, and music to unlock!

Buying the game now will get you all future updates as well as keys on other services if and when it's released on them. Also please give us feedback on the game! You can reach out to us through any of our social networks or send us an email through our contact form.
